hypothesis_content.title: ETH/BTC Ratio Momentum Reversal at Daily Support
hypothesis_content.statement: When the ETH/BTC ratio declines to its 100-day moving average during NEUTRAL/BULL regimes and shows a bullish engulfing pattern on the daily chart with increasing volume, the ratio experiences a momentum reversal with 4-7% appreciation over the next 3-5 days as capital rotates from BTC to ETH.
hypothesis_content.rationale: The 100-day SMA acts as major support for ETH/BTC during constructive markets. Bullish engulfing at this level indicates rejection of lower prices. Volume confirmation suggests institutional rebalancing. Historical data shows this setup precedes short-term ETH outperformance.
entry_conditions: Daily candle shows bullish engulfing pattern (current low < previous low, current close > previous high)
Engulfing day volume > previous day's volume by 25%
hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Ratio continues declining below 100-day SMA after pattern in >60% of instances, or fails to achieve 4% appreciation within 5 days in >55% of cases during backtesting.
